entities.name: perkin's old tent
entities.description: The tent that was lost by the group on the night they were caught by the Snatchers. (Excerpt: 'they had lost Perkin’s old tent on the night that the Snatcher’s caught them')

entities.name: beaded bag
entities.description: A bag that was packed with Perkin's old tent and protected by Hermione. (Excerpt: 'It was now packed inside the beaded bag, which...')

entities.name: snatchers
entities.description: A group of people who caught Harry's group on the night they lost Perkin's old tent. (Excerpt: 'the Snatcher’s caught them')

entities.name: bill
entities.description: Harry's friend who lent his group another tent after they lost Perkin's old one. (Excerpt: 'Bill had lent them another one')

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: A member of Harry's group who protected the beaded bag from the Snatchers by stuffing it down her sock. (Excerpt: 'Hermione had protected from the Snatchers...')

entities.name: griphook
entities.description: A goblin who is part of Harry's group and whom they want to get rid of. (Excerpt: 'Most of all, he longed to be rid of Griphook')

entities.name: gryffindor's sword
entities.description: A magical sword that is in the possession of Harry's group and which they do not want to hand over to Griphook. (Excerpt: 'precisely how and when they were to part from the goblin without handing over Gryﬃndor’s sword')

entities.name: shell cottage
entities.description: A place where Harry's group is staying. (Excerpt: 'He was looking forward to escaping the conﬁnement of Shell Cottage')

relationships.description: Bill lent his group Perkin's old tent after they lost it. (Excerpt: 'Bill had lent them another one')
Hermione protected the beaded bag from the Snatchers by stuffing it down her sock. (Excerpt: 'Hermione had protected from the Snatchers...')
Griphook has Gryffindor's sword, which Harry's group does not want to hand over. (Excerpt: 'precisely how and when they were to part from the goblin without handing over Gryﬃndor’s sword')
Griphook is a member of Harry's group. (Excerpt: 'a question to which Harry had no answer')
